rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Alternate ID
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An alternate id for a resource. Used when a resource is assigned a new identifier and the old identifier needs to be preserved. For example, when two resources are merged.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Persistent ID
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A long-term persistent identifier for a resource. It is expected that the value conform to a well-known persistent identification standard.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Extension
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An extension point for custom genealogical data.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A reference to a type. This is different from rdf:type and dcterms:type because its value is a _reference_ to a resource (as opposed to the actual resource).
